CustomField.description: If checked creates case Requestor/Parent case Owner as case team members on child cases. Do not select this if there is a process which already creates Case Team Member for that particular record type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked creates case Requestor/Parent case Owner as case team members on child cases. Do not select this if there is a process which already creates Case Team Member for that particular record type.
CustomField.label: Create Case Team Member for Child Case
